name: Spherikill (Orb Tower Defense)
description:
Spherikill is a Tower Defense game that takes similar ideas from Bloons Tower Defense (BTD).  Strategically choose and position towers with bunnies, aliens, even a carrot juicer to destroy all the orbs that enter your path.  

Gain karats to spend on upgrades to make gameplay easier or change up your game plans.  

With currently 4 difficulty modes, allowing you to put your  strategies to the test.

If you have any criticism or are interest in future project send me an email,  or please comment.  Thanks!

This is the first game I have ever made through its completion.

Also expect updates to the game.  I am releasing this to test out any bugs I wasn't able to find by myself.  As well as  adding new enemies, making the game more efficient and fun.
